eprosima::rpc::protocol::Protocol

eprosima::rpc::protocol::Protocol Class Reference
[Protocols]

This abstract class represents the protocol used by the RPCs. It serializes and deserializes the information and uses a eprosima::rpc::transport::Transport to send it and receive it. More...

Detailed Description

This abstract class represents the protocol used by the RPCs. It serializes and deserializes the information and uses a eprosima::rpc::transport::Transport to send it and receive it.
